directions.step:
1. Grind walnuts
2. Whip egg whites until they form soft peaks
3. Add yolks 1 at a time while whipping.
4. Add 2 T breadcrumbs and walnuts by hand.
5. Butter a tube pan and sprinkle it with the rest of the breadcrumbs.
6. Bake in a 350 F oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
NOTES : This cake is delicious as is or filled with "Baba de Mo√ßa" ( coconut egg cream) Recipe by: Olguinha Posted to TNT - Prodigy's Recipe Exchange Newsletter by Leon & Miriam Posvolsky <miriamp@pobox.com> on Aug 07, 1997
